title: Com Hem - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2011, EQT sold the company to BC Partners. Com Hem held its initial public offering (IPO) on 17 June 2014 and became listed on Stockholm Stock Exchange. On 27 April 2017 Kinnevik acquired approximately 18.5% of the stock and became Com Hem's largest stock holder.

title: Com Hem
snippet: EQT III acquired Com Hem AB, a Swedish cable TV operator, in 2003.

title: BC Partners to acquire Com Hem — BC Partners
snippet: July 21, 2011 – BC Partners, a leading international private equity firm, today announces that it has signed an agreement to acquire Com Hem, Sweden’s leading TV, broadband and telephony company, from The Carlyle Group (“Carlyle”) and ...

title: Com Hem Archive - Tele2
snippet: The Com Hem Group merged with Tele2 the 5th of November 2018.
